articles.author: F1
articles.title: Hulkenberg loses front-row start in Canada as he lands three-place grid drop for red flag breach - Formula 1
articles.description: Nico Hulkenberg has been hit with a three-place grid penalty for the Canadian Grand Prix after the stewards found him guilty of committing a violation under red flags during qualifying.
articles.content: Fresh from the elation of bagging a front-row start in Montreal, Haas driver Nico Hulkenberg has been hit with a three-place grid penalty for the Canadian Grand Prix after the stewards found him guil… [+2954 chars]
